programme.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2
programme.desc: Making their final stand upon the ramparts of Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, Harry Potter, Ron and Hermione face their greatest foe and make a sacrifice on their journey.

programme.title: Resident Alien
programme.desc: Harry faces one final threat, and one that forces him to use more than just his alien strength.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Stabler and Benson seek a connection between two men who are beaten and branded with a wire hanger in seemingly separate incidents.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A man sees his wife abducted while video chatting with her, but Benson finds that the victim tried to pick up the ransom herself.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The kidnapping of a young boy reminds Cragen, Munch and Benson of an unsolved case from 13 years earlier.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The detectives go under cover to arrest a man who brutally attacks other men; a deceptively tough defense attorney (Nia Vardalos) complicates ADA Barba's case.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: Members of the NCIS team are in danger after their pictures, as well as Mosley and her son's names, are included on a cartel hit list; Mosley is questioned about the off-the-books mission in Mexico.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: While assisting the team with an undercover operation, an informant is arrested; Callen meets with ATF Agent Anna Kolcheck, who remains on suspension following her last joint case with NCIS.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: The team attempts to locate Mosley after she murders a cartel hit man and goes off the grid.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and Stabler must determine a murder victim's actual identity when the presumed victim turns up alive.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A teenage girl's death in a hit-and-run accident leads Benson and Stabler to a human trafficking ring; Cragen becomes frustrated by his crumbling precinct.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When Benson and Stabler investigate a young woman's rape and murder, the case puts them in the line of fire and exposes a larger mystery that includes more victims.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Stabler notices that Benson is bonding with Calvin, the boy left in her care; Fin and Munch must investigate when the name of Calvin's mother (Maria Bello) comes up during a rape investigation.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Investigation into the death of a young boy leads to a gambling ring.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and Stabler have to get creative when a rape victim's father refuses to help the detectives get the information they need to solve a case.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: ADA Sonya Paxton (Christine Lahti) tries to help an old friend (Debra Messing) who starts receiving personal threats.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The investigation into the stabbing death of a family man leads Benson and Stabler to believe he had an illicit hobby; the detectives meet a woman and her jealous boyfriend while undercover at a swingers club.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: After a baby is found on a playground, Detectives Stabler and Benson look for the child's caregiver.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a woman finds a teenage boy sleeping naked in her bedroom, detectives Benson and Stabler investigate the teen and his mother to find out what really happened.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detectives Benson and Tutuola dig into the past of a basketball star while investigating sexual abuse charges against his former coach.

Emergency response providers put their lives at risk to save others.
A night at an amusement park takes a deadly turn when a roller coaster malfunction leaves lives hanging in the balance; Abby reaches out to Buck; Athena and Hen respond to an unusual home invasion.

Bobby and his team respond to an emergency at a children's birthday party; the crew jumps into action after one of their own is involved in a devastating accident; Athena tries to cope with a tragedy that hits way too close to home.

Bobby and the team race to help the survivors of a deadly plane crash; Athena deals with chaos at the airport; Bobby confronts his past demons; Athena is out for revenge against teen bullies; Abby delivers an important message from a 9-1-1 caller.

The crew races to an emergency at an Indian wedding; Abby enlists Buck to help her find her mother; Abby meets Athena for the first time; Bobby confronts his past; Hen struggles to make the right decision.

On Valentine's Day, a surprise marriage proposal goes awry with dangerous consequences; Athena attempts to help a desperate woman; Bobby and Chimney pull holiday duty; Abby and Buck go on their first official date.

A full moon keeps the crew busy with crazy calls; Athena investigates a potential home invasion; Abby helps investigate a caller's murder; Bobby and Buck have their hands full at a yoga studio for pregnant women; Hen's past may become her future.
Bobby gets a surprising phone call from his doctor after donating at Chimney's blood drive; Athena confronts Michael after having a heart-to-heart with their kids.

programme.title: Premier League Stories
programme.desc: When Arne Slot guided Liverpool to their 20th League title in his debut season, it marked the beginning of a new era, yet echoed a familiar tradition. programme.title: CFL Football
programme.desc: Ottawa visits Winnipeg. Facing a 22-1 deficit following a fumble-six to end the first quarter, the Redblacks rallied to beat the Argonauts 46-42 in a Week 10 thriller in Toronto. Ottawa quarterback Dru Brown threw for 373 yards and five touchdowns.
